metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to |Cashguard| - S_LOW_CountingHouse_Guard_07 52504043-35b8-47ec-8ea4-4ac40593654e - (-140; 1; -269)

0.speaker: Cashguard Artillerist Heen
0.text: Don't linger too long under the chandeliers. If another tremor hits... well, that'd make a pretty mess.

1.speaker: Cashguard Artillerist Heen
1.text: My mum says those tremors are from drow digging up through the Underdark. My mum... doesn't get out much.
